LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_OnlySowOnAsh: Enable certain plants only being sowable on ash terrain.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BaseAshResistance: Enable a base ash resistance value for all apparel that covers the full head.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BaseAshResistanceValue: The base ash resistance for all apparel that covers the full head: ({0}%)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_FlowerFeeding: Enable certain animals feeding from ashland flowers.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_ScampInsulting: Enable scamp trained in hauling occasionally insulting pawns.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshcanoJoy: Enable colonists building ashcanos as a source of joy.
